title: How to Make Marshmallow Mint Chocolate Cake Snack

steps.headline: Cut a single slice of cake.
steps.description: Then, cut it horizontally, separating it into two parts.

steps.headline: Tear the marshmallows into small pieces.
steps.description: Place these pieces in between the two pieces of cake. You can also put a few pieces on top.

steps.headline: Tear the peppermint patty or patties into small pieces, just like the marshmallows.
steps.description: Place these on top of the cake.

steps.headline: Put the cake carefully in the microwave.
steps.description: The top half might fall over, so leave space on the plate for any minor avalanches. Heat on high for about 20-40 seconds, depending on how much of the candy you put on the cake.

steps.headline: Serve immediately.
steps.description: It should be nice and gooey, as well as being comfortingly warm. Have it with a cup of hot chocolate or cocoa.

text: Cut a single slice of cake. Then, cut it horizontally, separating it into two parts. Tear the marshmallows into small pieces. Place these pieces in between the two pieces of cake. You can also put a few pieces on top. Tear the peppermint patty or patties into small pieces, just like the marshmallows. Place these on top of the cake. Put the cake carefully in the microwave. The top half might fall over, so leave space on the plate for any minor avalanches. Heat on high for about 20-40 seconds, depending on how much of the candy you put on the cake. Serve immediately. It should be nice and gooey, as well as being comfortingly warm. Have it with a cup of hot chocolate or cocoa. Finished.
